Summary: Every night numerous lighted objects appear at the same time and move about freely.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around April 9th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsEvery night at approximately 8. p.m. numerous lighted objects appear and stay their until 5 or 6 a.m. They move about freely and one has a bright light and others are dim. They don't male any noise. Looked up at the sky and noticed them. The way they kept moving. Very hard to get pi ctures. It is best if you see it. All you see is lights and it being there every night at the same time seems unusual. The idea of not knowing what it is is unsettling. My son sees it and my my neighbor saw it and we cannot figure it out. When the day light starts it leaves in fact saw one going through the clouds at 6 a.m.
